qas.question: Which largest private oil companies are based in Oklahoma City?

answers.text: Devon Energy Corporation, Chesapeake Energy Corporation, and SandRidge Energy Corporation

qas.question: What industry are all of the Oklahoma-based Fortune 500 companies in?
What is the largest company in Oklahoma?
What is the 2nd-largest company in Oklahoma?

context: According to Forbes magazine, Oklahoma City-based <a0_0>Devon Energy Corporation, Chesapeake Energy Corporation, and SandRidge Energy Corporation<a0_0/> are the largest private oil-related companies in the nation, and all of Oklahoma's Fortune 500 companies are <a1_0>energy<a1_0/>-related. <a4_0>Tulsa<a4_0/>'s <a2_0>ONEOK<a2_0/> and <a3_0>Williams Companies<a3_0/> are the state's largest and second-largest companies respectively, also ranking as the nation's second and third-largest companies in the field of energy, according to Fortune magazine. The magazine also placed Devon Energy as the second-largest company in the mining and crude oil-producing industry in the nation, while Chesapeake Energy ranks seventh respectively in that sector and Oklahoma Gas & Electric ranks as the 25th-largest gas and electric utility company.
